actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to require manufactures of farm tractors for sale in interstate commerce to mark the engine blocks of such tractors with permanent identification numbers.

summary.text: Requires manufacturers of farm tractors for sale in interstate commerce to mark the engine blocks of such tractors with permanent identification numbers.

titles.title: A bill to require manufactures of farm tractors for sale in interstate commerce to mark the engine blocks of such tractors with permanent identification numbers.
